channel.title: CV In/Our Circuits
channel.description:
So i decided to start look at making a extension board (Pots and CV in-out) and is searching the best possible way to create a circuit for CV in and out the pot part is pretty straight forward...
Does anyone have a simple schematic to fix my needs?!
